title: Integrate with Passwordsafe
author: ITCTOM
body_snippet:
Tt would be great if mremote is able to Access the Passwords stored in Passwordsafe [0].
But not to store the passwod in machine configuration but to establish a link to passwordsafe so that Passwords are only stored in passwordsafe ans mremote uses These paswswords.



[0] https://www.passwordsafe.de/

iterations.description: Enhancement request to integrate PasswordSafe as an external credential provider, similar to existing integrations.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.8 (Fenix)

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Enhancement request to integrate PasswordSafe as an external credential provider, similar to existing integrations.
Approach: Implement a new external connector class for PasswordSafe in the ExternalConnectors project, likely wrapping the PasswordSafe CLI or library, and register it as a credential provider.
